ios.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: SimRun needs background location access to track your running route, calculate distance, and record your pace even when the screen is locked.
ios.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: SimRun needs access to your location to show your current position on the map and record your starting point.
ios.NSMotionUsageDescription: SimRun needs access to your motion data to count your running steps.
ios.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: SimRun needs access to your photo library to select a profile picture.
ios.NSCameraUsageDescription: SimRun needs access to your camera to take photos.
ios.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: SimRun needs access to your microphone for audio features.
ios.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: SimRun uses Face ID to secure your data.

android.permission_android_permission_ACCESS_FIN: SimRun needs access to your location to track your running route.
android.permission_android_permission_ACCESS_COA: SimRun needs access to your location to track your running route.
android.permission_android_permission_ACCESS_BAC: SimRun needs background location access to track your route when the screen is locked.
android.permission_android_permission_ACTIVITY_R: SimRun needs access to your motion data to count your running steps.
android.permission_android_permission_CAMERA: SimRun needs access to your camera to take photos.
android.permission_android_permission_READ_EXTER: SimRun needs access to your photo library to select a profile picture.
android.permission_android_permission_WRITE_EXTE: SimRun needs access to save photos to your device.
